Package imagingbook.lib.util

Class Enums

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.util.Enums
  • public abstract class Enums
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines static methods for handling enum types.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  Enums.Description
      Field annotation with a (required) string parameter to supply a descriptive text to the associated enum constant.

    • Constructor Summary

      Enums()

    • Method Detail

      • getEnumNames

        public static <E extends java.lang.Enum<E>> java.lang.String[] getEnumNames​(java.lang.Class<E> enumclass)
        This static method returns an array of all constant names (strings) for a given enumeration class. Names are arranged in the same order as the enum constant definitions. Assume the enum definition: 
        enum MyEnum {A, B, C};
        Usage: 
        String[] names = getEnumNames(MyEnum.class);
        This returns the array 
        {"A", "B", "C"}
        Type Parameters:
        E - the generic enum type
        Parameters:
        enumclass - enumeration class
        Returns:
        array (possibly empty) of names defined for the specified enumeration class

      • getEnumDescriptions

        public static java.lang.String[] getEnumDescriptions​(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Enum<?>> enumClass)
        This static method returns an array of all description strings attached as Enums.Description annotations to enum-constants in the given enumeration class. For non-annotated constants the constants name is used as a substitute. Descriptions are arranged in the same order as the enum constant definitions. Usage example: 
         public enum EnumWithAnnotations {
        @Description("Abra Kadabra") A, 
        @Description("Bubba Can Walk") B,
        C;
 }
        This returns the array 
        {"Abra Kadabra", "Bubba Can Walk", "C"}
        Parameters:
        enumClass - the enumeration class
        Returns:
        array (possibly empty) of descriptions defined for the specified enumeration class

      • getEnumDescriptionsMap

        public static <E extends java.lang.Enum<E>> java.util.EnumMap<E,​java.lang.String> getEnumDescriptionsMap​(java.lang.Class<E> enumClass)
        Returns an EnumMap with the enum constants as the keys and the associated descriptions (of type String) as the values. Descriptions are specified by annotating enum fields (see Enums.Description). For non-annotated constants the constants name is used as a substitute. Keys and values are arranged in the same order as the enum constant definitions. This is experimental code (currently unused).
        Type Parameters:
        E - the generic enumeration type
        Parameters:
        enumClass - the enumeration class
        Returns:
        a map as described
